message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10500?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see you're interested in the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $12500. This is the lowest price I can go, considering the value it brings to the table. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $12500 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11000?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $12000, which is my minimum price. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but $12000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11500?

I think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can offer it to you for $11750. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but $11750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Would you be willing to consider a price of $11250?
